Articles.Content: I don't know why, but if i try to edit my avatar, the "do not use an avatar" is checked and i cannot un-check it, please help!

I moved the thread to a more appropriate forum. My guess would be that because you are still a Curious George (I.E. less than five posts) your permissions are limited. Wait until you post more than five times and come back here
Oh ok then, thanks alot kind sir, i will work more on the forum then. that might be it
You need about 5 posts to get permission to edit you must pass the spambot test.
